title: Security Engineer Intern
location: Work where you want, when you want
description: Assist in securing the BaseBuzz ecosystem, researching vulnerabilities, and building security automation.
fullDescription:
BaseBuzz is pioneering AI-powered DeFi, governance automation, and real-world asset tokenization. As a Security Engineer Intern, you’ll work closely with our security and engineering teams to help secure our smart contracts, dApps, and trading infrastructure.

This internship is a hands-on opportunity to gain experience in Web3 security, vulnerability research, and on-chain monitoring. You'll learn from experienced blockchain security engineers and contribute to critical security initiatives within the BaseBuzz ecosystem.
responsibilities: Collaborate with engineering teams to automate security monitoring and secure coding practices.
Develop alerting systems for potential security threats in both Web2 and Web3 environments.
Conduct research on DeFi security vulnerabilities, smart contract exploits, and blockchain attack vectors.
Assist in auditing smart contract code, identifying risks, and implementing best practices.
Help build tools for detecting suspicious transactions and securing on-chain governance mechanisms.

mustHave: Excitement for DeFi, Base ecosystem, and on-chain security.
Experience with at least one of: JavaScript, TypeScript, ReactJS, React Native, Python, or Solidity.
Currently pursuing a degree in Computer Science, Cybersecurity, Engineering, Math, or related fields.
niceToHave: Personal or professional projects related to blockchain security, smart contract audits, or DeFi tools.
Previous internship experience in a security or engineering organization.
Hands-on experience with cybersecurity frameworks, penetration testing, or threat modeling.
Love for degen trading, base memes, and pushing the limits of on-chain security.

compensation.tokenRewards: Opportunity to earn $BASEBUZZ through contributions and security research.
benefits: Remote internship with some of the best de-fi wizards on Base.
Learn from top security engineers working on DeFi and AI-powered security.
On-chain reputation tracking—build your verified Web3 security profile.
Early access to upcoming BaseBuzz features, projects, and governance influence.
